about.paragraph1: Passionate about programming since childhood, focusing on software development with a special interest in games.
about.paragraph2: My full-stack experience includes front-end development with React (Vite/TypeScript) and back-end with .NET/Entity Framework (UNIPAM), as well as development with React.js, data integration (N8N), and Java/Spring Boot microservices (B2LIST).
about.paragraph3: I seek to apply my skills to build robust and efficient applications. Let's connect!

Experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
Experiences.description: Currently working on the development of pages, components, and endpoint consumption, using React.js, Styled Components, and React Query.

Projects.title: Shadows of Void
Projects.description: Shadows of Void is an RPG Idle game with deep itemization and interactive gameplay. The project is being developed in React, utilizing new development concepts with IDEs that feature AI agents.
